resources.string:
Hi I am Abhishek. 

I love Coding and I want to be a good Software Developer. 

I have been working on my coding skills and I have gained working knowledge required in this field. 

I will soon begin to work on my personal project and I will create some big projects to gain more knowledge and improve my skill set. 

I am also good at physical activities like running and playing basketball. 
I also play video games. 
I like reading books. 

The most important thing is I want to be financially independent and I will do this in recent times. 

I am currently pursuing graduation degree in Information Technology. 
From childhood I had a keen interest in maths and always wanted to solve more hard problems. 
From there I got into coding and now I like coding and getting better day by day. 
Thank you for reading this and I hope you will see be better on next day.
